item.name: Whispering Hills
item.description: Whispering Hills is owned and operated by the Lyons family (Audrey and Darcy Lyons). Darcy is responsible for the winemaking, while Audrey takes care of the cellar door and distribution. The vineyard was established in 1985 with further plantings in 96 and some grafting in 2003, and now consists of cabernet sauvignon (2ha), riesling, chardonnay and pinot noir (1ha each). Exports to Japan and China.
